attributes.action: give the critically acclaimed Chris Claremont an honorary knighthood for services to the arts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Chris Claremont is the famous comic book writer whose record includes a 17 year stint on Uncanny X-Men which is considered to be the defining period in that comic. During this stint he has won countless Eagle awards among others. His work also includes Exacalibur, Exiles and Spider-Woman, among many and is famed for co-creating Captain Britain. In addition he is an accomplished novelist with several works to his name. Despite being currently an American, he is the most successful and well-recognized British-born comic book writters.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
